inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality displays a list of pending items to be shipped on a shipment order, allows user to enter ship quantity and/or short-close remaining lines.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This Parts Order has been closed or canceled.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No open lines available in this parts order.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality displays a list of pending items to be shipped on a shipment order, allows user to enter ship quantity and/or short-close remaining lines. Based on the stock attributes of the products and locations, inventory updates are made and/or serial number information is captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This Parts Order has been closed or canceled.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No open lines available in this parts order.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality displays a list of pending lines in an RMA, allows user to enter quantity received and/or short-close remaining requests. Based on the stock attributes of the products and locations, inventory updates are made and/or serial number information is captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This RMA has been closed or canceled.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No open lines available in this RMA.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_NAME_C: Post to Inventory - Work Order Usage
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality performs inventory updates for usage lines in a work order. Depending upon stock attributes of the location and product, serial number information is also captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This work order is not open.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No pending usage lines in this work order to post to inventory.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_NAME_C: Receive Parts for a Work Order
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality displays a list of pending part requests in a work order, allows user to enter quantity received and/or short-close remaining requests. Based on the stock attributes of the products and locations, inventory updates are made and/or serial number information is captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This work order is not open.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No open parts request lines available in this work order.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_NAME_C: Receive Parts from Warehouse for a Parts Request
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality displays a list of pending lines in a standalone part request from an internal location such as a warehouse, allows user to enter quantity received and/or short-close remaining requests. Based on the stock attributes of the products and locations, inventory updates are made and serial number information is captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This parts request is not open or it is from a supplier.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No open lines available in this parts request.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_NAME_C: Receive Parts from Supplier for a Parts Request
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality displays a list of pending lines in a standalone part request from an external entity like a supplier, allows user to enter quantity received and/or short-close remaining requests. Based on the stock attributes of the products and locations, inventory updates are made and serial number information is captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This parts request is not open or it is not from a supplier.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: No open lines available in this parts request.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality performs inventory updates for a stock adjustment transaction. Depending upon stock attributes of the location and product, serial number information is also captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: This Stock adjustment has been posted to inventory.

inventoryprocess.SVMXC_DESCRIPTION_C: This functionality performs inventory updates for a stock transfer transaction. Depending upon stock attributes of the location and product, serial number information is also captured.
inventoryprocess.SVMXC_Child_Error_Msg_c: All lines in this Stock transfer have been posted to inventory.
